build: xcodebuild -project SpatialConnect.xcodeproj -scheme SpatialConnect build; carthage update
unit_test: xcodebuild -project SpatialConnect.xcodeproj -scheme SpatialConnect -sdk iphonesimulator -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 6 Plus' ONLY_ACTIVE_ARCH=NO test; xcodebuild -project SpatialConnect.xcodeproj -scheme SpatialConnect test
